LInux HTPC

Have been interested in these for a long time and had most of one
built. But the inability to get legal access to the TV show times (in
Australia the networks retain all rights to Timetabling information)
and the frying of my video card put it on the back burner.

Since I've been in the US tho, we have a PVR built right into our cable
box and we can do things like time-shift tv and easily schedule
recordings - I LOVE IT!!! I'll be spending a bit of time and building one when I get home for sure.
